  • § English tips for Brazilians: Connectors

    Connectors are words (or conjunctions) used to join two phrases, doing a relationship between them. Sample in Portuguese: portanto, logo, pois, como, mas, embora, porque, entretanto. Here you can see a list of some connectors that you can use.
